String.string: Nice work, my friend! You're getting better at this by the day!
Go to the {@Rgn:50002$$Shroud Outpost} and find {@LinkCreature:250#3001#Derik}.
Hunt {@LinkCreature:50#5#akathela prowlers} near {@Rgn:50002$$Shroud Outpost} and collect their hides.
Hunt {@LinkCreature:50#10#zomgul gatherers} around the {@Rgn:50007$$Dryuul Cyasma Infuser} and collect their hides.
Hunt {@LinkCreature:50#4#kalash devastators} north of {@Rgn:50002$$Shroud Outpost} and collect their hides.
